Package DAO

Class CustomerAccess

java.lang.Object
DAO.CustomerAccess
public class CustomerAccess extends Object
Class which provides various means of access to Customer class, such as retrieving customer object lists, adding, deleting, and updating Customer objects, looking up customers, and converting data from database into Customer object.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Method that returns allCustomers list.
      Returns:
      Returns allCustomers ObservableList.

    • getFilteredCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getFilteredCustomers()
      Method that returns filteredCustomers list.
      Returns:
      Returns filteredCustomers ObservableList.

    • addCustomer

      public static void addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Method that adds Customer object to allCustomers list
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object to be added.

    • removeCustomer

      public static boolean removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      Method that removes Customer object to allCustomers list
      Returns:
      Returns true if Customer object was successfully removed, otherwise false.

    • executeDelete

      public static boolean executeDelete(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      Method that contains main logic behind deleting Customer objects and data from database. All appointments associated with Customer to delete are also removed, to which user is alerted.
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object to determine customer data to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Returns true if delete is successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • initializeCustomers

      public static void initializeCustomers()
      Method that initializes Customer objects via customers table in database.

    • getCustomerObjFromDB

      public static Customer getCustomerObjFromDB(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Method that takes customer information from database and returns a new Customer object based on said data.
      Parameters:
      rs - ResultSet used to query database for customer data to use.
      Returns:
      Returns newly created Customer object.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateCustomer

      public static void updateCustomer(int id, Customer updatedCustomer)
      Method that updates Customer object in allCustomers list.
      Parameters:
      id - Customer ID to determine Customer object's index position in list.
      updatedCustomer - Updated Customer object.

    • lookupCustomer

      public static Customer lookupCustomer(int customerId)
      Method that searches allCustomers list using customer ID and returns Customer object.
      Parameters:
      customerId - Customer ID to search list against.
      Returns:
      Returns Customer object; returns null if not found.

    • lookupCustomerId

      public static int lookupCustomerId(String customerName)
      Method that searches allCustomers list using customer name String and returns Customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerName - String customer name to search list against.
      Returns:
      Returns Customer ID integer; returns -1 if not found.

    • lookupIndex

      public static int lookupIndex(int customerId)
      Method that searches for allCustomers list index given an customer ID and returns index.
      Parameters:
      customerId - Customer ID to search list against.
      Returns:
      Returns index of Customer object in list; returns -1 if not found.

    • lookupCustomer

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> lookupCustomer(String userText)
      Method that searches allCustomers list via user text input and returns list of Customer objects whose name contains user text.
      Parameters:
      userText - User text to search list against.
      Returns:
      Returns list of Customer objects whose name contains user's text input.

    • getAssociatedAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAssociatedAppointments(int customerId)
      Method that searches all appointments list and compares appointment's customer IDs to passed customer ID, which determines all appointments associated with given customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - Customer ID with which to compare Appointment's associated Customer ID.
      Returns:
      Returns list of Appointment objects that are associated with given customer.

    • executeAdd

      public static void executeAdd(String name, String address, String postalCode, String phone, String createdBy, String lastUpdatedBy, int divId) throws SQLException
      Method that contains main logic behind adding Customer objects and data to database.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of newly created Customer and database insert.
      address - Address of newly created Customer and database insert.
      postalCode - Postal code of newly created Customer and database insert.
      phone - Phone number as a String of newly created Customer and database insert.
      createdBy - User who created this customer object.
      lastUpdatedBy - User who created this customer object.
      divId - First-level division ID of newly created Customer and database insert.
      Throws:
      SQLException
